TopicTitle: aerial capture (getting a small plane inside another plane while flying)

Articles.Content:
Tomorrow, aerial docking! managed to do it with docking ports.

small preview:

http://gfycat.com/HastyQuestionableFrigatebird

That is both; hilarious and awesome!

Three ch(b)eers!
Dude this was awesome. The fold up wings are amazing. What engine did you use, it looked like it had an afterburner. Was something nested in that basic engine?

thank you both!!

I used the stock engine, with a visual mod called hot rockets, an awesome mod!!
This is really cool. What mods did you use besides the one already mentioned?

Great stuff man, but what about on Laythe, or even Jool, with a space hangar and a ship that can almost fit inside it, and then dock? That would be the best man!

When I have the time, I'll watch the whole video, but not now, its 8:44 PM and i'm too busy ATM.
